column4: Hey. I just finished getting a new Ubuntu installation all set up, and I restarted once, and it was all fine, but had changed the resolution. I went to the display preferences and changed it to something that worked, and all seemed well. But the next time I turned the computer on, it was outside the monitor's display range. I'm currently on the liveCD.
Can anybody help me out here?
you need to ask something before we can help
